subject: FROM THE OFFICE OF THE PRESI
body:
FROM THE OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
OFFICE OF THE NATIONAL INVESTIGATIONS (B.N.I)
HIGH LORD OFORI OWUSU HENRY OWUSU
ACCRA,GHANA.
DATE
CODE OF CONDUCT (Law 526) 1996
Attention Beneficiary,
I am Mr.Ofori Owusu Henry,Chairman of the BUREAU
OF NATIONAL INVESTIGATIONS(BNI) in connection
with the Economic Community of West African States
(ECOWAS)Based in Ghana.We have been working to
eliminate scammers  and impostors in the western
part of Africa.With the help of the US Government
and the United Nations,we have been able to track
down many of these scammers in various part of
West African countries including (NIGERIAN,REPUBLIC
OF BENIN,TOGO,GHANA,CAMEROON AND SENEGAL as well as ENGLAND)
And they are all in our custody here in Accra,Ghana.
We have been able to recover huge amounts of funds from
these scammers.The United Nations crime commission and the
US Government have ordered that the funds recovered be
awarded to a hundred an thirty beneficiaries (130) around
the globe which you happens to be among.This message is directed
to you because your number and email address was found in one
of the scammers file and hard drive of his computer which is
presently in our custody here in Ghana.You will therefor be
compensated with the sum of Two Million Five Hundred United
States Dollars ($2,500,000.00 usd).Funds will be transferred
to you by The Standard Chartered Bank.According to the records
we are having here,this scammers have defrauded many victims out
of their hard earned money as they claim to be Lawyers,bank officials
,Lottery agents,Military personels,Doctors,Ministers and even Presidents
who have Funds,Golds,Diamonds,Crude oil and so on and so forth to
Transfer or deliver to their victims.
Since your email address and telephone number were listed among the
beneficiaries who will receive this compensation funds,we will be
expecting that you reply back to this notification email with the
vital details below
1. Full names
2.Contact residential address
3.Reachable telephone number/s
4.Email Address or addresses
These vital information will be sent to the correspondent bank where
the compensation funds are presently deposited for onward transfer
to beneficiaries which is The Standard Chartered Bank for them to
be able to contact you for the possible and quick transfer of
Your compensation funds to your choice nominated account.
We urgently await to hear from you.
Warmest Regards,
Mrs Christy Abbabio
Senior Secretary to
BNI.

subject: Re:   FROM THE OFFICE OF THE PRESI
body:
Dear Mrs. Christy Abbabio,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the recovery of funds from scammers. I am pleased to hear that such actions are being taken to combat these fraudulent activities.

Here are my details as requested:

Full Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Telephone Number: +1-555-555-5555

Please let me know what the next steps are in this process.

Best wishes,
Christina
